page.title: 02Peldon Hall
page.content: We went to{Peldon Hall,}where we could see{Abberon Reservoir. }The owners are the{Sawdons. }They have got two dogs, one is a horror, the other dog was friendly and quiet. Peldon Hall is an old house.{Mrs {Sawdon}has got a collection of unusual scissors on the wall in the kitchen. Peldon Hall had some {pigs,}but they sold their pigs and all of their land is used for growing {wheat. { {Peldon Hall}was built some 600 years ago and has since been extended in the sixteenth and eighteenth centuries. It has many interesting features, including a lovely 18th Century staircase with a moulded handrail.
